data.title: event timezones getting simplified incorrectly · Issue #519 · ecederstrand/exchangelib
data.meta_description: Hi, I might be driving it wrong, but exchangelib is over-simplifying event timezones in a way that is causing breakage. XML from server includes: <t:StartTimeZone Name="(UTC+00:00) Dublin, Edinburgh, Lisbon, London" Id="GMT Standard Time...
